The Willow Creek Lodge

Escape the city and discover the perfect balance of work and relaxation.

Located in the heart of the Peak District, our lodge offers a peaceful environment ideal for corporate retreats and team getaways. We provide comfortable accommodation, fully equipped seminar rooms, and access to stunning nature trails.

Our on-site restaurant prides itself on serving hearty meals made from local produce. We can also arrange guided hiking tours and team challenges.

For reservations, group bookings, or to discuss a tailored package, please get in touch.

15 River Road, Derbyshire, DE4 3JG
Tel. 01629 555 123
reservations@willowcreek.co.uk
www.willowcreek.co.uk

exams.title: Highland Landscapes Workshop
exams.incomingEmail:
HIGHLAND LANDSCAPES

Join us for a week-long photography workshop in the stunning Scottish Highlands with award-winning photographer, Sarah Jenkins.

Our local guides are experts in history and geology, ready to show you the hidden gems of the North.

The workshop includes daily field trips to Glencoe, the Isle of Skye, and Loch Ness. In the evenings, participants can attend seminars on photo editing and portfolio reviews.

For nature lovers, we include a private boat trip to see the seal colonies.

Accommodation is provided in 4-star historic hotels with breakfast and dinner included.

Contact: Fiona Campbell
45 Royal Mile, Edinburgh, EH1 1BB
Tel: +44 131 555 0199
Email: fiona@highland-photo.co.uk

Bright Horizon Language Institute – Dublin

Take your career to the next level with our specialized Business English courses.

Situated in the historic center of Dublin, we offer intensive training designed for professionals who wish to communicate more effectively in the global market. Our curriculum focuses on negotiation skills, presentation techniques, and intercultural competence.

Courses run year-round with small class sizes to ensure individual attention. We also offer a social program to help you explore Irish culture after class hours.

Interested in joining us? Contact our admissions team for schedules and booking information.

42 Grafton Street, Dublin 2, Ireland
Tel. +353 1 677 9900

exams.title: Gourmet Italian Cooking Weekend
exams.incomingEmail:
TASTE OF TUSCANY

Master the art of Italian cuisine during our exclusive weekend retreat with renowned TV Chef, Marco Rossi.

Hosted in a luxury converted farmhouse, our course offers hands-on training in our state-of-the-art professional kitchens.

We pride ourselves on quality. All participants will cook with premium, organic ingredients sourced directly from local farms.

The weekend package includes two full days of instruction, a recipe book to take home, and a guided tour of a local vineyard with wine tasting included.

No previous experience is required—just a passion for food!

Contact: Elena Ricci
